description: Erection of a single storey rear infill and rear extension, a rear roof extenion with two front windows and a single storey detached outbuilding in the garden
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (02, 03 RevA, 04 RevA and unnumbered location plan- received 2/06/2021
00 RevA- received 2/09/2021) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The outbuilding hereby approved shall not be used for purposes other than those specified on the plans hereby approved or such uses which are incidental to the house at [20 Clifden Road Brentford   TW8 0PF].  For the avoidance of doubt the building shall not be used as a living room, bedroom, kitchen or as a separate unit of accommodation, nor for business purposes.
